input.sentences: the store front was in view .
then we rode the ferris wheel .
our last stop was the mock castle for photos .
output.sentences: I was at the office and got very hungry.
I left and walked down the street to buy hot roast chestnuts from a street vendor.
Then, I went into a shop for some hard boiled eggs.
I strolled down to a street fair and took a ride on a ferris wheel.
The view from the top of the ride was amazing.
